categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle 4

Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle 4 is the upcoming fourth issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle. It will be written by Cavan Scott, illustrated by Francesco Francavilla and Chris Fenoglio, and published by IDW Publishing on October 13, 2021.

Join Cavan Scott, Francesco Francavilla, and a host of classic Star Wars artists in the epic conclusion to the Vader's Castle saga! Star Wars Adventures: Ghosts of Vader's Castle is a horror-packed, star-studded, five-week event guaranteed to haunt your dreams.
In issue #4, Lina's dreams are visited by the ghost of the galaxy's most threatening villain! The GHOSTS OF VADER'S CASTLE are looming closer...
